Posts.Content: On Jun 23, 2011 8:01 AM nancykarenjo wrote: I was on Aromasin for about 18 months, when I was in so much pain I could barley walk and my feet are in excrutiating pan 24/7.  I have swittched to femera and am having the same  symptoms.  I don't know what to do.  I can't go on like this.  All of my joints hurt, I am short of breadth and and sooo tired all of the time, but the foot pain is the worst.  Help! Hi, I started on Femara in January by the first of March I could not move from so much joint pain, I was swithed to Aromasin and after several weeks I started feeling so much better with just a few mild joint pains but now for the last 4 weeks, it all seems to be back, my knees hurt espescially my right, it makes cracking noises and my fingers ache, my thumbs , my left thumb sounds like I have bone on bone moving it. I can barely walk,  I will call my oncologist tomorrow , but wonder if I will be able to feel better on any of these. (diognosed breast cancer ,right breast stage 2  April 2010  had surgery, 6 chemos, 33 radiations)
Posts.Title: Side Effects From Aromasin
